#summary case insensitive string comparison function
#labels Phase-Implementation,Function

= strcmpi =

strcmpi is an ADORE function. It may help ADORE users in writing their own ADORE scripts.

It compares two strings inside ADORE in a case-insensitive fashion.

==Usage==
`strcmpi string1 string2`

==Examples==
{{{
ADORE: strcmpi "adore" "ADORE" && echo "same" || echo "not same"
same
ADORE: strcmpi "ADORE" "ADORE" && echo "same" || echo "not same"
same
ADORE: strcmpi "ADORE1" "ADORE2" && echo "same" || echo "not same"
not same
}}}

==Implementation==
{{{
function strcmpi()          # See "settings save" for example of use.
{
  if [ `echo ${1} | tr [:upper:] [:lower:]` == `echo ${2} | tr [:upper:]
    return 0;
  else
    return 1;
  fi
}
}}}
